title: Sea Otter Shakes Up the Life Time Grand Prix Script — Here’s What to Expect in 2025
content:
Now in its fourth season, the Grand Prix has shaken up the start of the series by starting with a gravel race. Early indicators point to what could be the tightest competition yet.

Read the full article at Sea Otter Shakes Up the Life Time Grand Prix Script — Here’s What to Expect in 2025 on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
